author: Times Of India
title: Shining torches in sky won't solve problem: Rahul Gandhi on Covid-19
description: India News: NEW DELHI: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Saturday made light of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's appeal to people to light lamps and shine torches on .
